name: First Weapon
description: The Blacksmith has offered to craft you a proper weapon if you bring him some basic materials.

objectives.description: Collect 1 piece of Wood for the handle

dialogue.offer: You look like you could use a proper weapon, young adventurer. Bring me some iron ore and wood, and I'll craft you something special.
dialogue.accept: Good! I need 2 pieces of iron ore and some wood for the handle. You might find ore in the deep parts of the forest.
dialogue.decline: Come back when you're ready for a real weapon.
dialogue.progress: Still gathering materials? Remember, I need iron ore and wood.
dialogue.complete: Perfect materials! Let me craft this for you... There, a fine steel sword! Use it well.
dialogue.completed: That sword I made for you should serve you well in your adventures.
